text: Luton Town Football Club are an English football club that are based in Luton in the county of Bedfordshire. They started in 1885 and play their home games at a stadium called Kenilworth Road. ==League position== Season League Position 2000/01 Second Division 22nd 2001/02 Third Division 2th 2002/03 Second Division 9th 2003/04 Second Division 10th 2004/05 League One Champions 2005/06 League Championship 10th 2006/07 League Championship 23rd 2007/08 League One 24th 2008/09 League Two 24th ===Former position=== ==Sources== Category:1885 establishments in England Category:English football clubs Category:Luton
title: Luton Town F.C.
